mod.name: Kalas
mod.description: Adds Kalas (from Baten Kaitos) as a playable character.

cards.name: Blue Storm

Apply 4 Poison.

cards.name: Blue Storm+
cards.description:
Finisher. Deal 10 Wind damage.
Apply 5 Poison.

cards.description:

Right click: Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Cedar Tree
cards.description:
Add 2 Sculpting Knives to your hand.
These are similar to Shivs but are weaker and have 3 Spirit Numbers.

cards.name: Cedar Tree+

Add 3 Sculpting Knives to your hand.
These are similar to Shivs but are weaker and have 3 Spirit Numbers.

cards.name: Chain Mail
cards.description: Gain 10 Block.

cards.name: Chain Mail+

cards.name: Chump Change
cards.description: On turn end, upgrade all cards remaining in your hand for the rest of combat. Evolving.

cards.name: Chump Change+
cards.description: On turn end, upgrade all cards remaining in your hand for the rest of combat. Evolving.

cards.name: Clock Shield
cards.description:

Right click: Gain 7 Chrono Block, draw !Kalas:Misc2! card(s).

cards.name: Clock Shield+
cards.description:
Left click: Deal 7 Chrono damage, draw !Kalas:Misc1! card(s).
Right click: Gain 10 Chrono Block, draw !Kalas:Misc2! card(s).

Right click: Gain 9 Chrono Block, draw !Kalas:Misc2! card(s).

cards.name: Duel Sword+

Right-click: Gain 12 Block.

cards.name: Earth Buckle+
cards.description: When removing any amount of elemental affinity without Equalize, draw 2 card(s).

cards.description: Gain 7 Fire Block, then Equalize yourself.

Then, in any case, deal 4 Water damage.

Gain !Kalas:Misc1! Strength.
Exhaust. Evolving.

Deal 3 damage.

cards.description: Increases card count by 1 for this battle.

cards.description: Increases card count by 1 for this battle.

Heal 7 HP.

Heal 10 HP.

cards.name: Brave Knight Helm
cards.description: Gain 4 Block.

cards.name: Brave Knight Helm+

cards.name: Burning Shield
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 11 Fire damage. Target gains !Kalas:Misc1! Strength for this turn.
Right-click: Gain 7 Fire Block. When attacked this turn, deal !Kalas:Misc2! damage back.

cards.name: Burning Shield+
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 14 Fire damage. Target gains !Kalas:Misc1! Strength for this turn.
Right-click: Gain 8 Fire Block. When attacked this turn, deal !Kalas:Misc2! damage back.

cards.name: Camera 1
cards.description:
Gain extra gold on battle end.
Normal battle: 10 gold.
Elite battle: !Kalas:Misc1! gold.
Boss battle: !Kalas:Misc2! gold.

cards.name: Camera 1+
cards.description:
Gain extra gold on battle end.
Normal battle: 15 gold.
Elite battle: !Kalas:Misc1! gold.
Boss battle: !Kalas:Misc2! gold.

cards.name: Cedar Tree Sap
cards.description:
Gain 2 Energy, draw !Kalas:Misc1! card(s). Next turn, draw !Kalas:Misc2! less card(s).
Evolving.

cards.name: Cedar Tree Sap+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Energy, draw !Kalas:Misc1! card(s). Next turn, draw !Kalas:Misc2! less card(s).
Evolving.

cards.name: Cetaka's Sword
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 10 damage, 3 times.
Right-click: Gain 8 Block, 3 times.
Both: Lose !Kalas:Misc1! HP.

cards.name: Cetaka's Sword+
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 13 damage, 3 times.
Right-click: Gain 10 Block, 3 times.
Both: Lose !Kalas:Misc1! HP.

cards.name: Chaotic Illusion
cards.description:
Finisher. Deal 4 Time damage, gain 4 Time Block.
Next turn, draw !Kalas:Misc1! card(s) and gain !Kalas:Misc2! Energy.

cards.name: Chaotic Illusion+
cards.description:
Finisher. Deal 6 Time damage, gain 6 Time Block.
Next turn, draw !Kalas:Misc1! card(s) and gain !Kalas:Misc2! Energy.

cards.name: Chronos Armor
cards.description:
Gain 28 Time Block. Draw !Kalas:Misc1!.
On turn end, lose 4 Block per card played anytime during this turn.

cards.name: Chronos Armor+
cards.description:
Gain 32 Time Block. Draw !Kalas:Misc1!.
On turn end, lose 4 Block per card played anytime during this turn.

cards.name: Chunk of Ice
cards.description:
Usable if no other card was played this turn. Deal 9 Water damage, apply 1 Weak.
Ethereal. Exhaust. Evolving.

cards.name: Chunk of Ice+
cards.description:
Usable if no other card was played this turn. Deal 13 Water damage, apply 1 Weak.
Ethereal. Exhaust. Evolving.

cards.name: Death Pendulum
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 12 Chrono damage, draw !Kalas:Misc1! card(s).
Right-click: Gain 9 Chrono Block, draw !Kalas:Misc2! card(s).
Both: If target has Chrono affinity, repeat.

cards.name: Death Pendulum+
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 16 Chrono damage, draw !Kalas:Misc1! card(s).
Right-click: Gain 12 Chrono Block, draw !Kalas:Misc2! card(s).
Both: If target has Chrono affinity, repeat.

cards.name: Deluxe Pickles
cards.description: After using a Finisher, draw 2 more cards next turn.

cards.name: Deluxe Pickles+
cards.description: After using a Finisher, draw 3 more cards next turn.

cards.name: Dream Blade
cards.description:
Finisher. Deal 8 Chrono damage to a random monster, !Kalas:Misc1! times.
Next turn, draw 2 extra card(s).

cards.name: Dream Blade+
cards.description:
Finisher. Deal 8 Chrono damage to a random monster, !Kalas:Misc1! times.
Next turn, draw 2 extra card(s).

cards.name: Dried Flowers
cards.description: Equalize everyone.

cards.name: Dried Flowers+
cards.description:
Equalize everyone.
Draw 1 card(s).

cards.name: Explosives
cards.description: Each turn, your first non-power card played has 35% increased damage, block, and healing.

cards.name: Explosives+
cards.description: Each turn, your first non-power card played has 50% increased damage, block, and healing.

cards.name: Flugel Shield
cards.description:
Innate.
Left-click: Deal 3 Wind damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Right-click: Gain 9 Wind Block.

cards.name: Flugel Shield+
cards.description:
Innate.
Left-click: Deal 3 Wind damage and apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
Right-click: Gain 12 Wind Block.

cards.description:

cards.name: Glacial Helmet+

Evolving.

cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Increase Spirit-Combo bonus by 20% for this turn.

cards.name: Gladius+

Increase Spirit-Combo bonus by 25% for this turn.

cards.name: Golden Buckle
cards.description: Gain 15% Elemental Boost, increasing elemental attack damage and block.

cards.name: Golden Buckle+

Heal 2 HP.

cards.name: Half Plate+

Add 3 random card(s) of any rarity to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Jack-in-the-Box+

Exhaust.

cards.name: Kusanagi Blade
cards.description: Equalize, then deal 4 Fire damage.

cards.name: Kusanagi Blade+
cards.description: Equalize, then deal 6 Fire damage.

cards.name: Large Fire
cards.description:
Apply 7 Burning to ALL enemies, apply !Kalas:Misc1! Burning to you.
Burning causes Fire damage at the end of each turn.
Ethereal. Exhaust.

cards.name: Large Fire+
cards.description:
Apply 10 Burning to ALL enemies, apply !Kalas:Misc1! Burning to you.
Burning causes Fire damage at the end of each turn.
Ethereal. Exhaust.

cards.name: Magic Beans
cards.description:
Does nothing.
Exhaust. Evolving.

cards.name: Magic Beans+
cards.description:
Does nothing.
Exhaust. Evolving.

cards.description: Gain 25% Spirit-Combo bonus.

cards.name: Magic Beans: All+

cards.description: Gain 1 Strength and !Kalas:Misc1!% damage and block with elemental cards.

cards.name: Magic Beans: Flame+
cards.description: Gain 2 Strength and !Kalas:Misc1!% damage and block with elemental cards.

cards.name: Magic Beans: Ice
cards.description: Gain 1 Dexterity and !Kalas:Misc1!% damage and block with non-elemental cards.

cards.name: Magic Beans: Ice+
cards.description: Gain 2 Dexterity and !Kalas:Misc1!% damage and block with non-elemental cards.

cards.name: Marvelous Sword
cards.description:
Left-click: deal 9 damage, then equalize.
Right-click: Gain 6 Block and 1 energy, Exhaust.

cards.name: Marvelous Sword+

Left-click: deal 12 damage, then equalize.
Right-click: Gain 8 Block and 1 energy, Exhaust.

cards.name: Mineral Water
cards.description:
Left-click: Add 15 Water affinity to target.
Right-click: Heal !Kalas:Misc1!, gain !Kalas:Misc2! Energy, discard !Kalas:Misc2! random card(s).
Both: Exhaust.

cards.name: Mineral Water+
cards.description:
Left-click: Add 20 Water affinity to target.
Right-click: Heal !Kalas:Misc1!, gain !Kalas:Misc2! Energy, discard !Kalas:Misc2! random card(s).
Both: Exhaust.

cards.name: Ometeotl Gear
cards.description: Innate. Gain 10 Time Block, lose 3 Strength for this turn, next turn draw !Kalas:Misc1! extra card(s).

cards.name: Ometeotl Gear+
cards.description: Innate. Gain 14 Time Block, lose 3 Strength for this turn, next turn draw !Kalas:Misc1! extra card(s).

cards.name: Pot of Air
cards.description:
Usable if target has 1/2 health or less.
Deal 5 Wind damage and apply 5 Poison.

cards.name: Pot of Air+
cards.description:
Usable if target has 1/2 health or less.
Deal 7 Wind damage and apply 7 Poison.

cards.name: Prophet's Notebook
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal Time damage equal to 2 + selected Spirit Number value.
Right-click: Draw !Kalas:Misc1! card(s), Exhaust.

cards.name: Prophet's Notebook+
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal Time damage equal to 4 + selected Spirit Number value.
Right-click: Draw !Kalas:Misc1! card(s), Exhaust.

cards.name: Rainy Emblem
cards.description:
Left-click: Usable if target has exactly 1 affinity. Deal 9 Water damage, apply 2 Weak.
Right-click: Equalize and apply !Kalas:Misc1! Weak to ALL enemies, Exhaust.

cards.name: Rainy Emblem+
cards.description:
Left-click: Usable if target has exactly 1 affinity. Deal 12 Water damage, apply 2 Weak.
Right-click: Equalize and apply !Kalas:Misc1! Weak to ALL enemies, Exhaust.

cards.name: Scale Buckle
cards.description: Gain 20% Combo Boost, increasing Spirit-Combo bonus.

cards.name: Scale Buckle+
cards.description: Gain 25% Combo Boost, increasing Spirit-Combo bonus.

cards.name: Silver Sword
cards.description: Left-click: deal 6 damage for each elemental affinity on target, plus once. Right-click: gain 4 Block for each elemental affinity on you, plus once.

cards.name: Silver Sword+
cards.description: Left-click: deal 9 damage for each elemental affinity on target, plus once. Right-click: gain 6 Block for each elemental affinity on you, plus once.

cards.name: Small Fire
cards.description:
Apply 5 Burning to the target, apply !Kalas:Misc1! Burning to you.
Burning causes Fire damage at the end of each turn.
Ethereal. Exhaust. Evolving.

cards.name: Small Fire+
cards.description:
Apply 7 Burning to the target, apply !Kalas:Misc1! Burning to you.
Burning causes Fire damage at the end of each turn.
Ethereal. Exhaust. Evolving.

cards.name: Tempest Shield
cards.description:
Left-click: deal 1 Wind damage and apply !Kalas:Misc1! Poison, 3 times.
Right-click: Gain 13 Wind Block. Shuffle !Kalas:Misc2! Dazed in your draw pile.

cards.name: Tempest Shield+
cards.description:
Left-click: deal 1 Wind damage and apply !Kalas:Misc1! Poison, 4 times.
Right-click: Gain 14 Wind Block. Shuffle !Kalas:Misc2! Dazed in your draw pile.

cards.name: Vintage Coins
cards.description: On turn end, gain 3 Block for each upgraded card remaining in your hand.

cards.name: Vintage Coins+
cards.description: On turn end, gain 4 Block for each upgraded card remaining in your hand.

cards.name: Water Blade
cards.description:
Finisher. Deal 13 Water damage, apply 1 Weak.
If target has no elemental affinity, repeat once.

cards.name: Water Blade+
cards.description:
Finisher. Deal 17 Water damage, apply 1 Weak.
If target has no elemental affinity, repeat once.

cards.name: Wild Strawberry
cards.description:
Gain 1 Energy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wild Strawberry+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Energy.
Gain 3 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wind God Blade
cards.description:
Left click: Deal 9 Wind damage to ALL enemies, apply 1 Vulnerable.
Right click: Gain 12 Wind Block.
Both: Put !Kalas:Misc1! Dazed in your draw pile.

cards.name: Wind God Blade+
cards.description:
Left click: Deal 12 Wind damage to ALL enemies, apply 1 Vulnerable.
Right click: Gain 16 Wind Block.
Both: Put !Kalas:Misc1! Dazed in your draw pile.

cards.name: Young Bamboo
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
If target has at least 2 affinities, deal 6 more damage and Equalize.

cards.name: Young Bamboo+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
If target has at least 2 affinities, deal 8 more damage and Equalize.

cards.name: Amber
cards.description: On turn start, reduce the cost of a random card by 1 for the turn, then increase the cost of another random card by 2 for the turn.

cards.name: Amber+
cards.description: On turn start, reduce the cost of a random card by 2 for the turn, then increase the cost of another random card by 2 for the turn.

cards.name: Apocalypse Sword
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal damage equal to target's total elemental affinity.
Right-click: Gain block equal to your total elemental affinity.
Both: Equalize target.

cards.name: Apocalypse Sword+
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal damage equal to 0 + target's total elemental affinity.
Right-click: Gain block equal to 0 + your total elemental affinity.
Both: Equalize target.

cards.name: Charcoal
cards.description:
Gain 3 Fire Block.
Permanently increase the damage and block of a random Short Sword (if you have any) by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Charcoal+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Fire Block.
Permanently increase the damage and block of a random Short Sword (if you have any) by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Efreeti Saber
cards.description:
Left-click: Usable if target has Fire affinity. Deal 17 Fire damage, gain 1 Energy.
Right-click: Gain 6 Fire Block, !Kalas:Misc1! Energy and !Kalas:Misc2! Strength for this turn, Exhaust.

cards.name: Efreeti Saber+
cards.description:
Left-click: Usable if target has Fire affinity. Deal 21 Fire damage, gain 1 Energy.
Right-click: Gain 7 Fire Block, !Kalas:Misc1! Energy and !Kalas:Misc2! Strength for this turn, Exhaust.

cards.name: Efreeti Suit
cards.description:
Gain 8 Fire Block.
Gain 3 Strength for this turn.

cards.name: Efreeti Suit+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Fire Block.
Gain 4 Strength for this turn.

cards.name: Erbschaft
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 5 Time damage, Equalize the target, draw 1 card(s).
Right-click: Gain 9 Time Block, for each card played discard !Kalas:Misc1! random card and draw !Kalas:Misc1! card.

cards.name: Erbschaft+
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 8 Time damage, Equalize the target, draw 1 card(s).
Right-click: Gain 13 Time Block, for each card played discard !Kalas:Misc1! random card and draw !Kalas:Misc1! card.

cards.name: Esperanza
cards.description:
Deal 3 Chrono damage, !Kalas:Misc1! times.
Draw 1 card(s).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Esperanza+
cards.description:
Deal 3 Chrono damage, !Kalas:Misc1! times.
Draw 1 card(s).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fairy Shield
cards.description:
Left-click: deal 1 damage. Apply 2 Vulnerability. Gain !Kalas:Misc1! Dexterity, Exhaust.
Right-click: Gain 14 Block. Shuffle !Kalas:Misc2! Wound in your draw pile.

cards.name: Fairy Shield+
cards.description:
Left-click: deal 2 damage. Apply 3 Vulnerability. Gain !Kalas:Misc1! Dexterity, Exhaust.
Right-click: Gain 18 Block. Shuffle !Kalas:Misc2! Wound in your draw pile.

cards.name: Fangs of Light
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage X times.
Heal for half the damage dealt.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fangs of Light+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage X times.
Heal for half the damage dealt.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Full Plate
cards.description: Gain 6 Block. Discard all non-elemental cards, gain 4 Block per card discarded.

cards.name: Full Plate+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block. Discard all non-elemental cards, gain 5 Block per card discarded.

cards.name: Golden Helm
cards.description:
Left click: Gain 6 Block.
Right click: Gain 10% Spirit-Combo boost, increasing the bonus.
Both: Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Helm+
cards.description:
Left click: Gain 9 Block.
Right click: Gain 15% Spirit-Combo boost, increasing the bonus.
Both: Exhaust.

cards.name: Hot Rice Wine
cards.description: Increases Spirit-Combo bonus by 50% for this turn.

cards.name: Hot Rice Wine+
cards.description: Increases Spirit-Combo bonus by 70% for this turn.

cards.name: Lord of the Wind
cards.description:
Finisher. Deal 8 Wind damage to ALL enemies, 4 times, and apply !Kalas:Misc1! Vulnerable.
Gain 8 Wind Block.

cards.name: Lord of the Wind+
cards.description:
Finisher. Deal 8 Wind damage to ALL enemies, 5 times, and apply !Kalas:Misc1! Vulnerable.
Gain 8 Wind Block.

cards.name: Platinum Buckle
cards.description:
Left click: Gain !Kalas:Misc1! Strength.
Right click: Gain !Kalas:Misc2! Dexterity.

cards.name: Platinum Buckle+
cards.description:
Left click: Gain !Kalas:Misc1! Strength.
Right click: Gain !Kalas:Misc2! Dexterity.
Both: Gain 1 Energy.

cards.name: Savings Book
cards.description: When playing a card that costs 2 or more, reduce its cost by 1 (minimum cost of 1) for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Savings Book+
cards.description: When playing a card that costs 2 or more, reduce its cost by 2 (minimum cost of 1) for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Savings With Interest
cards.description:
When playing a card that costs 2 or more, reduce its cost by 1 (minimum cost of 1) for the rest of combat.
Adds !Kalas:Misc1! gold to battle rewards.

cards.name: Savings With Interest+
cards.description:
When playing a card that costs 2 or more, reduce its cost by 2 (minimum cost of 1) for the rest of combat.
Adds !Kalas:Misc1! gold to battle rewards.

cards.name: The Chariot
cards.description: Finishers grant 4 Block per energy used.

cards.name: The Chariot+
cards.description: Finishers grant 5 Block per energy used.

cards.name: Void Phantom
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 6 Wind damage, 4 times.
Right-click: Gain 16 Wind Block.
Both: Adds !Kalas:Misc1! Fire, Water and Chrono affinities to target.

cards.name: Void Phantom+
cards.description:
Left-click: Deal 6 Wind damage, 5 times.
Right-click: Gain 21 Wind Block.
Both: Adds !Kalas:Misc1! Fire, Water and Chrono affinities to target.

cards.name: Wasabi Root
cards.description:
Lose 2 Strength, gain !Kalas:Misc1! Energy, draw !Kalas:Misc2! card(s).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wasabi Root+
cards.description:
Lose 2 Strength, gain !Kalas:Misc1! Energy, draw !Kalas:Misc2! card(s).
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wonder MOMO
cards.description:
Heal 9 HP.
Gain !Kalas:Misc1! Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wonder MOMO+
cards.description:
Heal 11 HP.
Gain !Kalas:Misc1! Strength.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Broken Ocean Mirror
relics.description: After using a total of 2 Finishers, gain 1 extra energy on your next turn.
relics.flavorText: A memento of adventures past, of betrayal and redemption.

relics.name: Azure Sand
relics.description: Swords gain +1 damage and block per base energy cost.

relics.name: Coral Plant
relics.description: Increases total non-elemental damage and block by 15%.

relics.name: Paper Fan
relics.description: On turn start, gain 3 Block of a random element.

relics.name: Rainbow Emblem
relics.description: Increases total elemental damage and block by 15%.

relics.name: Ancient Branch
relics.description: Evolving cards evolve three times as fast.

relics.name: Ashes
relics.description: After using a left-click and a right-click from flexible cards, gain 1 Block and deal 1 Fire damage to all enemies.

relics.name: Mana Stone
relics.description: Finishers that cost 1 energy deal 20% more damage. Finishers that cost at least 2 energy have their cost reduced by 1.

relics.name: Maple Leaf
relics.description: Increases damage and block from Equalize by 100%.

relics.name: Forbidden Fruit
relics.description: Increases maximum energy by 1. Combo bonus is reduced by 15%, and your cards can no longer evolve.

keywords.name: Elemental
keywords.description: Elemental damage / block is ineffective when using opposite elements (Fire VS Water, Wind VS Chrono) during the same turn on the same target.

keywords.name: Equalize
keywords.description: Removes all elemental affinities. For every 5 affinity removed, deal 1 damage (monsters) or gain 1 block (Kalas).

keywords.name: Evolving
keywords.description: An Evolving card changes into a different card after climbing enough floors.

keywords.name: Finisher
keywords.description: Can only be used on a target you just attacked. Ends your turn when played.

keywords.name: Flexible
keywords.description: A flexible card has two different uses: left-click or right-click.

keywords.name: Spirit-combo
keywords.description: Combine the Spirit Numbers on Kalas' cards to form straights or same-of-a-kinds and get bonuses on turn end. Each card must be part of it..
